node.name: Code Conversion(GB,UTF)
node.shortdescription:
This small plugin is used for chinese programmer change the encode of the source-file. In the windows platform the default encode is GBK, and in the linux the default encode is UTF-8. It is very messy to change the encode of IDE. This plugin can change the GBK source file to UTF-8, and change UTF-8 source-file to GBK. It can recognize the encode of file automacticly.

这个小的编码转换插件是用于解决eclipse下跨平台开发的中文文件编码问题，在windows平台下默认的编码为GBK，而在linux下面默认为UTF-8，如果遗留的代码没有按照统一的格式编写，那么文件中的中文部分将无法识别。本插件的主要功能是识别文件编码，将GBK编码转换为UTF-8，也可以将UTF-8转换为GBK。
node.body:
This small plugin is used for chinese programmer change the encode of the source-file. In the windows platform the default encode is GBK, and in the linux the default encode is UTF-8. It is very messy to change the encode of IDE. This plugin can change the GBK source file to UTF-8, and change UTF-8 source-file to GBK. It can recognize the encode of file automacticly.

这个小的编码转换插件是用于解决eclipse下跨平台开发的中文文件编码问题，在windows平台下默认的编码为GBK，而在linux下面默认为UTF-8，如果遗留的代码没有按照统一的格式编写，那么文件中的中文部分将无法识别。本插件的主要功能是识别文件编码，将GBK编码转换为UTF-8，也可以将UTF-8转换为GBK。
node.companyname: Software Engineering Group, Department of Computer Science & Technology, Nanjing University
